name: tatum-thegraph-subgraph
description: Subgraph definitions for the tatum contracts

scripts.build: npm run compile-contracts && graph codegen subgraph.development.yaml && graph build subgraph.development.yaml
scripts.docker:build: npm run build && docker build . -t streamr/graph-deploy-subgraph:dev
scripts.deploy-docker-dev: graph deploy streamr-dev/tatum --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://streamr-dev-ipfs:5001 --node http://streamr-dev-thegraph-node:8020 subgraph.development.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy streamr-dev/tatum --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020 subgraph.development.yaml
scripts.deploy-production: npm run build-production && graph deploy $npm_config_subgraph --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $npm_config_config
scripts.doAll: npm run build && npm run create-local && npm run deploy-local
scripts.doAll-inside-docker-dev: npm run build && npm run create-docker-dev && npm run deploy-docker-dev
